[ show source ]

      # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/stack.rb, line 17
17:       def ==(middleware)
18:         case middleware
19:         when Middleware
20:           klass == middleware.klass
21:         when Class
22:           klass == middleware
23:         else
24:           normalize(@ref.name) == normalize(middleware)
25:         end
26:       end
